statements: SELECT id, customer_name, order_date, product_name, quantity, total_amount FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount, product_name, quantity, order_date, id FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT product_name, order_date, total_amount, id, quantity, customer_name FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT id, total_amount, customer_name, order_date, quantity, product_name FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT customer_name, quantity, product_name, id, order_date, total_amount FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM DataCleansing WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM DataCleansing GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM DataCleansing WHERE total_amount < 500 ORDER BY product_name ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing
SELECT id, data FROM DataCleansing WHERE cleaning_status='pending'
SELECT data, cleaning_status FROM DataCleansing ORDER BY cleaning_status DESC
SELECT id, transformed_data FROM DataTransformation
SELECT original_data FROM DataTransformation WHERE id=1
SELECT id, data, cleaning_status FROM DataCleansing WHERE cleaning_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, original_data, transformed_data FROM DataTransformation WHERE transformed_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, data FROM DataCleansing UNION SELECT id, original_data AS data FROM DataTransformation ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, data, cleaning_status FROM DataCleansing WHERE data LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT name, age FROM DataCleansing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT process_name, status FROM TransformationProcesses ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM DataQualityImprovement WHERE value > threshold;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT name, age FROM DataCleansing WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, process_name, status FROM TransformationProcesses WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM DataQualityImprovement;
SELECT id, metric_name, threshold FROM DataQualityImprovement WHERE value < threshold;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT id, data_source FROM DataCleansing WHERE cleansing_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM TransformationProcess ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM DataQualityImprovement WHERE metric_value > 0.8;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM AnalyticsTasks WHERE task_status = 'pending' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM DataCleansing;
SELECT id, data_source, cleansing_status FROM DataCleansing WHERE cleansing_status='Completed';
SELECT id, process_name, transformation_status FROM TransformationProcess ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_metric_value FROM DataQualityImprovement;
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS num_tasks FROM AnalyticsTasks GROUP BY task_name HAVING num_tasks > 1;
SELECT * FROM data_quality_jobs;
SELECT job_id, job_name FROM data_quality_jobs WHERE job_status = 'Completed';
SELECT job_name, job_description FROM data_quality_jobs ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'Database';
SELECT * FROM data_cleansing_rules WHERE rule_description LIKE '%validation%';
SELECT * FROM data_quality_jobs ORDER BY job_name DESC, job_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT job_name, job_description FROM data_quality_jobs WHERE job_status='Pending' AND job_id > 3;
SELECT source_id, source_name, source_type FROM data_sources WHERE source_type='Database' ORDER BY source_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM data_cleansing_rules WHERE LENGTH(rule_description) > 100;
SELECT transformation_id, transformation_name, transformation_description FROM data_transformations WHERE transformation_id BETWEEN 2 AND 6 ORDER BY transformation_id DESC;
